children.value: A vertically displayed navigation bar for switching between different content areas.
Bind the index of the currently selected item through

props.code:
<z-sidebar v-model="active"> 
  <z-sidebar-item title="tag name" /> 
  <z-sidebar-item title="label name" /> 
  <z-sidebar-item title="tag name" /> 
</z-sidebar>

<z-sidebar v-model="active"> 
  <z-sidebar-item title="tag name" /> 
  <z-sidebar-item title="label name" disabled /> 
  <z-sidebar-item title="label name" /> 
</z-sidebar>

children.value: method to listen for events when switching navigation items.

props.code:
<z-sidebar v-model="active" @change="onChange"> 
  <z-sidebar-item title="Tag name 1" /> 
  <z-sidebar-item title="label name 2" /> 
  <z-sidebar-item title="Tag name 3" /> 
</z-sidebar>

children.value: property, a small red dot will be displayed in the upper right corner; After setting the
property, the corresponding logo will be displayed in the upper right corner.

props.code:
<z-sidebar v-model="active"> 
  <z-sidebar-item title="label name" dot /> 
  <z-sidebar-item title="label name" badge="5" /> 
  <z-sidebar-item title="tag name" /> 
</z-sidebar>

children.value: Index of the current navigation item
Whether to display the small red dot in the upper right corner
The content of the logo in the upper right corner of the icon
Customize the attributes of the badge. The passed-in object will be passed through to the
The component provides the following CSS variables that can be used to customize styles. For usage, please refer to the

html .default .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html.dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}
